title: Fluffy Pancakes with Chocolate Chips
ingredient: Flour, Eggs, Milk, Sugar, Baking powder, Chocolate chips
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, and baking powder. Add eggs and milk, then fold in chocolate chips. Cook on a griddle until golden brown.

title: Spicy Chickpea Curry
ingredient: Chickpeas, Onions, Tomatoes, Garlic, Ginger, Turmeric powder, Chili powder, Cumin seeds
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. Add tomatoes, spices, and chickpeas. Simmer until chickpeas are tender.

title: Lemon Garlic Butter Shrimp
ingredient: Shrimp, Garlic, Butter, Lemon juice, Cilantro
instructions: Sauté shrimp in garlic and butter. Add lemon juice and cilantro. Cook until shrimp are opaque.

title: Mango Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend mangoes, bananas, yogurt, and milk until smooth.

title: Tomato Basil Chicken Pasta
instructions: Sauté chicken, garlic, and tomatoes. Add basil. Toss with cooked pasta.

title: Hilsa Fish Curry
ingredient: Hilsa fish, Mustard oil, Turmeric powder, Onions, Garlic
instructions: Fry fish in mustard oil with turmeric powder. Cook onions and garlic, then add the fried fish.

title: Potato and Lentil Soup
ingredient: Potatoes, Lentils, Onions, Garlic, Cumin seeds
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and cumin seeds. Add potatoes, lentils, and water. Simmer until potatoes are tender.

title: Vanilla Chai Latte
ingredient: Milk, Tea leaves, Sugar, Vanilla extract
instructions: Brew tea leaves in milk. Add sugar and vanilla extract. Strain and serve.

title: Beef and Potato Stew
ingredient: Beef, Potatoes, Onions, Garlic, Bay leaves
instructions: Brown beef, onions, and garlic. Add potatoes and bay leaves. Simmer until beef and potatoes are cooked.

title: Cilantro Lime Chicken Tacos
ingredient: Chicken, Lime juice, Cilantro, Tortillas, Onions, Green chilies
instructions: Marinate chicken in lime juice and cilantro. Grill and serve in tortillas with onions and green chilies.
